reviewText: The seller was beyond excellent just a defective disk but I don't blame the seller at all.
Seller was quick to fix my problem, love the movie

This review is for the "fx" release of the two-movie Ranma set.
Includes one disc (labeled "DVD Special Edition - Rumiko Takahashi's Ranma  - The Movie 2 - R006 Disc 1") with two full-length feature films (~2-3 hrs run time).
Aspect Ratio = 4:3
Languages: English/Japanese
Subtitles: English
Region: All Regions
One of the Best Anime of all time! Although I hope it gets a reboot after the blu ray releases because I would totally pay for that just like I am buying the manga and anime.
As advertised, this was a great purchase! Exactly what I wanted!
